snippet.title: {RAMBLE}{INDIE ART GAME}{SHOWCASE OF CAPABILITIES}
snippet.description:
GOOD EVENING LADIES AND GENTLEMEN,
Tonight I have a short and sweet experience for you all in Ramble. I was not expecting the passive experience in which I did, but all the same can appreciate a developer's desire to share and showcase their capabilities. This is not necessarily a game, but it is a unique experience they have given us to explore. I actually found it quite relaxing just wandering around silently shortly after and seeing all of the changing seasons we are able to observe in the game. Next time, instead of choosing a satisfaction video YouTube has thousands of, perhaps give Ramble a try. I guarantee you will come out of it all the more content. For now I must bid you a GOOD EVENING and a GOOD NIGHT!

Play it for yourself:
https://jpotterf.itch.io/ramble
